comments:
At times the member outline in the Java view breaks, after which it does not
update when buffers are switched, etc. From the log I believe the exception that
causes this to happen may be the attached (sorry, it's a long stack trace).

If this isn't it, let me know and I will look again.

Cheers,

Adriaan
